name: Knights of Homm
description:
Simple strategy game inspired by Heroes of Might and Magic III. The Kingdom of Homm is under attack by monsters. Gather armies from nearby recruitment camps and defeat all creatures invading your land.

Hey, it's my first jam (and my first game), so be gentle. 8)

Controls:
Left Mouse Button - drag camera;
Right Mouse Button - move units;
Middle Mouse Button - speed up movement animations;
Mouse Vertical Scroll - zoom camera;
